response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is tailored to meet your unique needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value for you, estimated at $800,000, and we are excited to offer it to you at a special introductory price. We understand the importance of making this decision, and thus, we propose a price of $750,000 to ensure you have the chance to secure this remarkable asset without compromising on its quality or significance. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 750000}
